articles.content: Julie Bishop has been honoured with her own Barbie doll for being a glass-ceiling-shattering icon. Ms Bishop, the first woman to serve as foreign affairs minister, has had a doll made in her likeness… [+1943 chars]

articles.author: Emily Lefroy
articles.title: Angelina Jolie spotted leaving her ex-husband's apartment again, with her son - 9TheFIX
articles.description: Second time in a week
articles.content:
The rumour mill was abuzz after Angelina Jolie was spotted leaving her ex-husband Jonny Lee Miller's apartment a few days ago, while on a family trip to New York.
One visit apparently wasn't enough … [+2057 chars]
